text: The 2015–16 season is the club's 3rd season in the Scottish Premiership and their 6th consecutive season in the top flight. Inverness Caledonian Thistle will also compete in the League Cup, the Scottish Cup, and the Europa League. ==Results and fixtures== ===Pre season / Friendlies=== ===Scottish Premiership=== ===UEFA Europa League=== ====Qualifying phase==== ===Scottish League Cup=== ===Scottish Cup=== ==Squad statistics== During the 2015–16 season, Inverness Caledonian Thistle have used twenty-three different players in competitive games.
